We walked by this place and it was packed and had a sign celebrating their 60th anniversary as of 2012.  We figured it wouldn't disappoint but it did.  As we walked in the pinchos did not look as good as the previous place we went to.But we decided to have a few beers and sample but were really let down. Not sure why it's so busy- maybe bc it's a popular spot for the young college student crowd.  The food isn't good here.
